item.title: Illinois Governor JB Pritzker announces he's running for a third term
item.description: At a formal campaign kickoff event Thursday morning in Chicago, Pritzker said, "through every challenge and every triumph, I have grown to love Illino...

item.title: Iran’s President Mahmoud Ahmadinejad (2007) | 60 Minutes Archive
item.description: In 2007, Scott Pelley interviewed Iran’s President Mahmoud Ahmadinejad and pressed him on whether he would pledge not to test a nuclear weapon.

item.title: Iran’s President Hassan Rouhani (2015) | 60 Minutes Archive
item.description: In 2015, Steve Kroft interviewed Iran’s President Hassan Rouhani on the heels of the landmark nuclear deal Iran had signed with six world powers.

item.title: White House says no date set for Iran meeting
item.description: White House press secretary Karoline Leavitt said Thursday that no date has been set for a meeting between the U.S. and Iran that President Trump said...
